results.title: Apple Zero-Click Flaw in Messages Exploited to Spy on Journalists Using Paragon Spyware
results.summary:

results.title: Zero-Click AI Vulnerability Exposes Microsoft 365 Copilot Data Without User Interaction
results.summary:
